definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: These rocks have similar petrochemical compositions, mineral constituents and rock-forming tectonic settings.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石有相近的岩石化学成分和成岩构造环境。

sentences.english: A mat final aspect was chosen for its resemblance to the colour of the zinc domes and pinnacles.
sentences.chinese: 地板最终选择与镀锌圆顶和尖塔相近的颜色。

sentences.english: They are waitresses from a nearby restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 她们是相近一家饭店的女服务员。

sentences.english: The fruit looks similar to raspberries, but are more orange in color.
sentences.chinese: 果实与覆盆子相近，但颜色更偏橘黄。

sentences.english: Imagist poetry exists in both American and Chinese history of literature.
sentences.chinese: 意象诗是美中两国诗歌史上一个十分相近的诗歌现象。

sentences.english: Chen and Tian ancient sound similar, it is often for Ancient Tin.
sentences.chinese: 陈与田古音相近，故古书往往作田。

sentences.english: The strength of TiC-Ni cermets is close to that of the materials with similar composition prepared by traditional powder metallurgy process.
sentences.chinese: 其强度与传统方法生产的相近成分材料相比比较接近。

sentences.english: Very si-milar results can be obtained when industrial high-pure, ultra-fine powders are used.
sentences.chinese: 用工业生产的高纯超细粉体可重复获得相近的性能。

sentences.english: Previous studies have shown the cat’s embedded cry shares a similar frequency.
sentences.chinese: 先前的研究已经表明猫的嵌入叫声具有相近的频率。

sentences.english: The closer the relative, the more the pattern of repeats matches.
sentences.chinese: 血缘关系越近，这些重复的模式越相近。

sentences.english: Like blood , like good and like age , make the happiest marriage .
sentences.chinese: 门当户对，品行相近，年龄相仿，是最完美的婚姻。

sentences.english: The systolic pressure in the exercise training group was similar to that in the control group during experimental process.
sentences.chinese: 实验过程中运动训练组收缩压与对照组相近。

sentences.english: Her account of the incident approximates to that of the other witness.
sentences.chinese: 她对事件的叙述与另一位目击者的叙述相近。

sentences.english: A close relative of the listening project is the story project.
sentences.chinese: 一个与聆听项目非常相近的是故事项目。

sentences.english: In a functional test, the happy path is the same -- or close to -- the use case.
sentences.chinese: 在功能测试中，愉快路径与实际用例相同或相近。

sentences.english: Bll of the memories, so close to me, just fade away.
sentences.chinese: 所有的记忆，曾与我那样相近，都渐渐模糊淡去。

definition: to resemble one another/to be alike/similar
to be a good fit/to be identical with/to adjust oneself to/to fit in
